name: porkbun-dns
description: Manage Porkbun DNS records and domains via API v3. Create, read, update, and delete DNS records for domains managed by Porkbun.

PORKBUN_API_KEY.help: Create API credentials at Porkbun account settings

PORKBUN_SECRET_API_KEY.description: Porkbun secret API key from https://porkbun.com/account/api

config.help: Alternatively, store credentials in ~/.config/porkbun/config.json with format: {"apiKey": "key", "secretApiKey": "secret"}

steps: 1. Get API credentials: Log in to Porkbun and visit https://porkbun.com/account/api
2. Create API credentials (both public and secret keys)
3. Set environment variables OR create config file:
Option A: export PORKBUN_API_KEY='your-key' && export PORKBUN_SECRET_API_KEY='your-secret'
